channel.title: Invalid Client
channel.description: Hey, i have a source but it only allows a certain client to connect to it. How do i remove this so that any client can connect to my source? :) Thanks

item.title: Invalid Client
item.dc:creator: @pk_owned_u pk owned u
item.description:
@pk_owned_u wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:2, topic:370624”]searsh in signlink in your client the UID
like uid = 4245623

the copy that searsh ur uid in ur source client.java and replace the one from the client , or change the client one with the source one[/quote]

You got msn? it would be easier through there.
Thanks

Read full topic
